pr_title: [Rust Server] Bugfix #5947 multi tag generate multi method issue.

timeline.message: [Rust Server] Add test case yaml with multi tag.
[Rust Server] Add test case yaml with multi tag.

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think this is a warning - this is a perfectly fine situation to exist.
Also, I think we should say additional, not repeating.
timeline.author: richardwhiuk

replies.bodyText: LOGGER.info("generated skip additional tag " + tag + " with operationId=" + co.operationId);
replies.author: paladinzh

timeline.bodyText: Can you add an @Override annotation here? That way if the method we are overloading changes, we'll get a compile error.
timeline.author: richardwhiuk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1056,6 +1056,26 @@ public boolean isDataTypeFile(final String dataType) {
         return dataType != null && dataType.equals(typeMapping.get("File").toString());
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Add operation to group
+     *
+     * @param tag          name of the tag
+     * @param resourcePath path of the resource
+     * @param operation    OAS Operation object
+     * @param co           Codegen Operation object
+     * @param operations   map of Codegen operations
+     */
+    @SuppressWarnings("static-method")
